Description: Stationary emissions in the residential sector, including emissions from cooking, water heaters, etc. (residential buildings)
Stationary emissions from commercial and municipal buildings, including commercial cooking in restaurants

Category Name: Agriculture, Forestry, and Livestock Fuel Combustion
Description: Stationary emissions from fuel combustion in agriculture, forestry, fishing, and livestock (including generators, operation of farm equipment, etc.)
Other stationary emissions not captured elsewhere
Sequestration from carbon capture and sequestration
